title: Daisy Chains and Monster Games
description: Diversity is the name of the game for this varied potpourri of the real and surreal. The 27 stories in this collection run the gamut from funny to frantic, fearsome to fantastic. Stories of time travel and time lost, eternal love and prolonged revenge.Between these pages, you’ll find humor and horror, gruesome and gay, sensuous encounters to sinister soliloquies. You’ll meet a hodgepodge of characters, from people to ghosts, victims to victors, eternally famous to determined wannabes, heroes to out-of-body escapees. There’s something for everyone!
author: Allen McGill
